description:
A priest is tricked by a fox, who is then tricked by a kid.  A priest eats meat from the thigh of his goddess. A stingy man becomes a bug.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kozou to Kitsune / Kannon-sama no Kata Momoniku / Gonzou Mushi
The Boy and the Fox / One Piece of Kannon`s Thigh-Meat / Gonzou Bug
小僧と狐 / 観音さまの片もも肉 / ごんぞう虫
